programme.title: Love Meet Hope
programme.desc: A grandfather's love stories enlighten a jaded man and a moonstruck girl about the realities of love. Starring Amanda Markowitz, Bradley Fowler, Ed Asner

programme.title: Love Simple
programme.desc: Adam and Seta fall in love in a Brooklyn laundromat, but they’ve each got a secret and it’s a full-time job to keep they’re lies straight.

programme.title: Magic Boys
programme.desc: After witnessing a murder, a hapless pair of misfits escape their own near death experience by posing as male strippers - only to find themselves neck deep in even bigger trouble. Starring Vinnie Jones, Michael Madsen, Tamer Hassan

programme.title: Mary Loss of Soul
programme.desc: Mary's soul has been ripped from her body. She returns after disappearing without any memory of the traumatic events she experienced. Meanwhile a wrathful spirit haunts her family, leaving them no choice but to find her soul before time runs out.

programme.title: Me and the Devil
programme.desc: A dark story of madness, pain and love: A young man loses his girlfriend in a park after getting distracted for a short moment; A lonely girl obsessed with crime news and killers starts a trip into the world of evil; A serial killer keeps killing women in the city; and a man of great faith realizes that a dark power lurks waiting for more victims.

programme.title: Memory of the Dead
programme.desc: A creepy, Gothic thriller involving a woman who devilishly invites friends of her recently dead husband to her mansion.

programme.desc: 24 Hour Free Movies brings you a growing collection of popular movies and TV shows from around the world. Always Free & Always Fun
